sentences.sContent: ‘You are an idiot, ’ he tells them.
Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
sentences.sContent_eng: Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself.
sentences.sCn: 亲爱的读者，假设你是一个白痴。再假设你是一名国会成员。不过我的话说重复了。

remMethod.val: idio(独特的) ＋ t → 智力、 行为与一般人相比很独特 → 傻子

trans.tranOther: someone who is mentally ill or has a very low level of intelligence
